We are seeking an Associate Data Scientist to facilitate the development of Analytics solutions in support of UFG’s strategic plan. This individual will work closely with business units throughout the organization to develop and implement strategies that leverage data to enable enhanced decision making. The ideal candidate will possess strong technical and communication skills
